task_prefix: This dataset contains customer reviews and ratings for women's clothing items from an e-commerce retailer. It represents real-world customer feedback and purchasing behavior in online fashion retail, combining both textual review content and structured metadata about products and customer interactions. Each example contains 9 features. Predict the Rating.

column_descriptions.Review Text: The actual written review provided by the customer describing their experience with the clothing item
column_descriptions.Title: The title/headline of the customer review
column_descriptions.Department: The store department categorization of the reviewed item
column_descriptions.Class: More specific product classification within department
column_descriptions.Positive Feedback Count: Number of other customers who found the review helpful
column_descriptions.Recommended IND: Binary indicator if reviewer recommends the product

class_description: Target: Rating - Customer satisfaction score given to the product. Units: Stars. Range: 1-5 stars (integer values)
